Package me.philcali.device.pool.lock

Class LockingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.philcali.device.pool.lock.LockingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
@Generated("org.immutables.processor.ProxyProcessor")
@Immutable
public final class LockingService
extends Object
    The LockingService wraps the LockingMechanism for automatic lock extension for the duration of a longer running process. The component is a convenience that simply tracks all of the LockOutputs acquired by a client to the LockingMechanism. The service is useful to lock control plane resources for whatever reason. The typical use case is: 
         LockingService locker = LockingService.of(lockingMechanism);
     try (LockingService.Lock lock = locker.tryAcquire(LockInput.of(id)) {
         // Do something with held resource
     }

      • tryAcquire

        public me.philcali.device.pool.lock.LockingServiceModel.Lock tryAcquire​(LockInput input,
                                                                        long amount,
                                                                        TimeUnit unit)
                                                                 throws InterruptedException
        Tries to acquire a lock within a set duration.
        Parameters:
        input - Information to hold the lock in the form of a LockInput
        amount - The amount of TimeUnit to block
        unit - The TimeUnit value to apply to the wait
        Returns:
        The LockingServiceModel.Lock tracking the LockInput and resulting LockOutput
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Thrown when interrupting lock acquisition

        Throws:
